reference.shortdesc: A subtitle is an subordinate title for a resource. It is designed to augment the information about the resource in certain display contexts.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The subtitle element is a convenience element. It is equivalent to a titlealt element with title-role set to subtitle.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processing expectations are dictated by the rules for the titlealt element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subtitle element is specialized from titlealt. It is defined in the alternative-titles domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and title-role.
For this element, title-role has a default value of subtitle.

example.title: Examples
example.p: This section contains examples of how the subtitle element can be used.
